queries.query: INSERT INTO TB_TITULAR_COLS_DEF( NM_COLUMN, CD_TYPE, VL_LENGTH, USER_CREATED, DT_CREATED ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() )
UPDATE TB_TITULAR_COLS_DEF SET NM_COLUMN = ?, CD_TYPE = ?, VL_LENGTH = ?, USER_CREATED = ?, USER_ALTERED = ?, DT_ALTERED = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE ID = ?
